{"id":310033277,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 9 months","timestamp":1583550670,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/310033277/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n   double aux(double x, int n){\n    double res = 1;\n    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)\n    {\n        res *= x;\n    }\n    return res;\n    \n}\ndouble myPow(double x, int n) {\n    if (n == 1) return x;\n    else if (n % 2 == 0) {\n        double temp = aux(x, n / 2);\n        return temp * temp;\n    }else return x * myPow(x, n - 1);\n}\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n","has_notes":false,"notes":"","topic_tags":[]}
